message.content:
cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SD

Reasoning: The paper discusses the role of computerization in various aspects of the research process, including data collection, information processing, communication, and research assessment. This makes it relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including digital libraries (cs.DL), information retrieval (cs.IR), social and information networks (cs.SI), cybernetics (cs.CY), and software engineering (cs.SD). However, given the focus on metrics and assessment, cs.DL and cs.IR are the most likely sub-categories.
